description.value:
You can jury-rig solutions when you don't have the proper tools on hand. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Repair] damaged items without a repair kit.

If you have the raw materials available, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] a basic @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Caltrops]{Caltrop} set, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Candle], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Compass], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Crowbar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Fishing Tackle], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Flint and Steel], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Hammer], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ladder (10-foot)]{Ladder}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Piton], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Rope], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ten-Foot Pole], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Thieves' Tools (Replacement Picks)]{Replacement Thieves Picks}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Tool (Long)]{Long Tool} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Tool (Short)]{Short Tool}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Torch] without consulting a basic crafter's book.
